## TrackableCamera.removeEntity() method

Removes an entity from being tracked

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeEntity(entity: Entity): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entity | Entity | the entity you don't want to track anymore |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
